title: Ensnared
content:
Acquire Ensnared

Can be applied by Ensnaring Strike

How to Remove Ensnared

The "ensnared" condition can be removed by using the "help" action on the affected character. Note that help can not be used on self.

Ensnared Notes & Tips

Notes and tips go here.
